User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of AQT Max.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user entity.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user account was created.

emailVerified.description: Indicates if the user has verified their email address.

ban.description: Details regarding a user's ban status.

isBanned.description: Whether the user is currently banned.

appealRequested.description: Whether the user has requested an appeal.

appealStatus.description: The status of the user's appeal.

unbanAt.description: Timestamp for when a scheduled unban will occur.

appealDecision.description: The admin's decision or notes regarding the appeal.

Subscription.title: Subscription
Subscription.description: Represents a digital subscription offered on the marketplace.

id.description: Unique identifier for the subscription entity.

name.description: Name of the subscription (e.g., Netflix Premium).

description.description: Detailed description of the subscription benefits and features.

price.description: The base price of the subscription in PKR.

discountedPrice.description: The discounted price of the subscription in PKR (optional).

imageUrl.description: URL of the image representing the subscription.

variants.description: Groups of different versions or plans for the subscription (e.g., Size, Color).

price.description: Price for this specific option in PKR.

Category.title: Category
Category.description: Represents a category of subscriptions (e.g., Entertainment, Music).

id.description: Unique identifier for the category entity.

imageUrl.description: URL of the image representing the category.

Order.title: Order
Order.description: Represents an order placed by a user for a subscription.

id.description: Unique identifier for the order entity.

items.description: An array of items included in the order.

customerName.description: The name of the customer who placed the order.

customerPhone.description: The phone number of the customer.

subtotal.description: The subtotal of the order before discounts and taxes.

paymentScreenshotUrl.description: URL of the uploaded payment screenshot.

orderDate.description: Date when the order was placed.

status.description: Status of the order (e.g., pending, completed, cancelled).

credentials.description: Credentials for the delivered subscription account.

username.description: Username or email for the account.

note.description: A note from the admin to the customer regarding the order.

LegalPage.title: Legal Page
LegalPage.description: Represents a legal document page like Terms of Service or Privacy Policy.

id.description: Unique identifier for the legal page (e.g., 'terms', 'privacy').

title.description: The title of the legal page.

content.description: The full HTML or Markdown content of the page.

MenuItem.title: Menu Item
MenuItem.description: Represents a single item in a navigation menu.

id.description: Unique identifier for the menu item.

label.description: The text to display for the menu item.

href.description: The URL path the menu item links to.

order.description: The display order of the menu item.

CartItem.title: Cart Item
CartItem.description: Represents an item in a user's shopping cart.

id.description: Unique identifier for the cart item.

variantName.description: A concatenated string of selected variant options (e.g., 'Large / Red').

price.description: Price of the selected variant combination.

AppSettings.title: App Settings
AppSettings.description: Stores global application settings, such as payment details and support contacts.

bankName.description: The name of the bank for payments.

accountHolderName.description: The name of the account holder.

whatsappNumber.description: The contact number for WhatsApp support.

Notification.title: Notification
Notification.description: Represents a notification for a user.

userId.description: The ID of the user this notification is for.

message.description: The content of the notification message.

href.description: A URL path for the notification to link to.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the notification was created.

read.description: Indicates if the user has read the notification.

definition.description: Stores order information for all users.
Stores items in a user's shopping cart.
Stores application settings like payment details.
